ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] FYI/ Heritrix ARC naming, header	conventions due for update
ygData.msgSnippet: The proposal for adding the entire crawl order in the ARC-file sounds very attractive to me. But for wery large crawls (e.g. a crawl of 250.000 danish domains)
